channel.title: Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings

item.title: How to Build a High-Performance Cache Without External Libraries
item.description: Learn how to build a high-performance cache from scratch in .NET, moving from a simple ConcurrentDictionary to an optimized keyed-locking system. This deep dive explores how to master concurrency patterns like double-checked locking to protect your APIs and improve application scalability. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/how-to-build-a-high-performance-cache-without-external-libraries

item.title: Server-Sent Events in ASP.NET Core and .NET 10
item.description: ASP.NET Core 10 introduces native Server-Sent Events as a lightweight, HTTP-native alternative to SignalR for simple one-way real-time updates like dashboards and notifications. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/server-sent-events-in-aspnetcore-and-dotnet-10
